data.name: RIFT - Celestial Adventurer's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become the hero of prophecy with these incredible accessories! Strike fear into your enemies as you mount the ferocious Ethereal Drake, demonstrate legendary style by donning Asha Catari's Raiment, and flaunt your mystic abilities with the animated Ring of Ahnket Portrait Frame.

Ethereal Drake Mount

Travel the Comet of Ahnket on the back of a ferocious dragon.

Asha Catari's Raiment

Don the garb of the legendary Asha Catari.

Ring of Ahnket Portrait Frame

Show your loyalty to the Tenebreans with this advanced portrait frame.

data.short_description: Become the hero of prophecy with these incredible accessories! Strike fear into your enemies as you mount the ferocious Ethereal Drake, demonstrate legendary style by donning Asha Catari's Raiment, and flaunt your mystic abilities with the animated Ring of Ahnket Portrait Frame.
data.supported_languages:
French*, German*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c, June 2010 update
  • Hard Drive: 15.0 GB available
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compliant card
  • Other: Broadband internet connection (DSL, cable modem or other high speed connection)
